thread.title: West Point cadets to participate in technology conference
thread.title_full: West Point cadets to participate in technology conference

title: West Point cadets to participate in technology conference
text:
West Point cadets to participate in science and technology conference in Washington 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 10/22/15 3:01 am EDT - Updated: 10/22/15 3:01 am EDT 
WEST POINT, New York â€” A group of West Point cadets is heading to Washington for a science and technology conference. 
More than 20 U.S. Military Academy cadets and staff members will participate in the West Point Leadership, Ethics, and Diversity in STEM workshop in Washington D.C. on Friday. 
The workshop is designed to help talented middle school and high school students, especially those from backgrounds that might lack exposure to science and technology classes. The cadets will help with competitions and demonstrations. 
Cadet First Captain Eugene Coleman will speak to students. He is the fourth African American to become first captain, the highest leadership position in the Corps of Cadets.
